檃字的基本解释

檃
yǐn
〔檃栝（
ku?）〕ａ．矫正竹木弯曲或使成形的器具，如“故枸木必将待檃檃烝矫然后直。”ｂ．（就原有的文章、著作）剪裁改写。均亦作“檃括”、“隐栝”。

檃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yǐn］
［《類篇》於謹切］
亦作“櫽1”。
见“檃括”。

檃字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　檃； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页556第04
【唐韻】於謹切【集韻】倚謹切，?音隱。本作櫽。【說文】桰也。【註】正邪曲之器，楺曲者曰檃，正方者曰桰。【荀子·性惡篇】构木，必待檃栝烝矯然後直。【淮南子·脩務訓】其曲中規，檃栝之力。　又與隱同。【後漢·鄧訓傳】考量隱栝。　又【韻會】於靳切，音㒚。義同。

考證：〔【淮南子·務脩訓】〕　謹照原書務脩訓改脩務訓。
檃字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
檃字的起名意思

暂无。

檃
Basic explanation of words
檃
yǐn
〔檃栝(
ku?)] a. Tools for correcting bends or forming of bamboo and wood, such as "So the wood must be straightened and then straightened." b. (On original articles and works) tailoring and rewriting. Both are also referred to as "檃kuan" and "hidden 栝".
檃
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yǐn］
["Like Pian" Yu Jinqie]
Also known as "櫽1".
See "檃語".
檃
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　檃; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 556 04
[Tang Yun] Yu Jinqie [Jiyun] Leaning on Jinqie, the sound is hidden. This is a 櫽. [Said the text] Radon also. [Note] The instrument of righteous and evil tunes, the one with Pu tune is called 檃, and the one with square is called radon. 【Xunzi·Evil Sex】The wooden structure must be straightened and straightened. 【Huainanzi·Xiuwuxun】Its rules in the song, the power of 檃栝.　 Same with Yin again. [Post-Han·Deng Xun Biography] Considering Yin Zhi.　[Yunhui] Yu Jin Qi, Yin 㒚. The same meaning. Textual research: [[Huainanzi·Wuxiu Xun]] 　 I would like to modify the work training according to the original book.
